name: prolific-notifier
description: Chrome extension that notifies users when new studies are available on Prolific

scripts.copy-assets: npm run copy-audio && npm run copy-images && npm run copy-popup
scripts.copy-audio: mkdir -p dist/audio && cp -r audio/* dist/audio/ 2>/dev/null || cp *.mp3 dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.copy-images: mkdir -p dist/imgs && cp -r imgs/* dist/imgs/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.copy-popup: mkdir -p dist/popup && cp -r popup/* dist/popup/ && mkdir -p dist/styles && cp -r styles/* dist/styles/
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run create-zip
scripts.create-zip: zip -r prolific-notifier-v1.1.0.zip manifest.json dist/ popup/ styles/ imgs/ audio/ *.mp3 -x '*.ts' '*.map' 'node_modules/*' '.git/*'
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch

author: 404 Office Not Found
